walked-with-god.context: The mysterious description of Enoch's life

was-no-more.english: Then he was no more, for God took him

three-hundred-years.hebrew: וַיִּתְהַלֵּךְ חֲנוֹךְ אֶת־הָאֱלֹהִים אַחֲרֵי הוֹלִידוֹ אֶת־מְתוּשֶׁלַח שְׁלֹשׁ מֵאוֹת שָׁנָה
three-hundred-years.english: After the birth of Methuselah, Enoch walked with God three hundred years

pleasing-to-god.english: He was taken up so that he should not see death
